Articles.Content:
I recently got back into KSP after a long break. And just started playing .23.5 when i noticed something rather odd...i did not have the node that included the new "claw device" and i also had other issues with my save file. Which is where i believe the problem lies...all i did was transfer off my save file from .23 ...and i thought i heard rumors that there might be some issues doing that...

and just to completely fix the issues i was just going to start from scratch with a new career file...but i dont want to start from complete scratch..i was wondering where one might make a few edits in a save file to start out with a large amount of science so that i may "catch up" in tech to the level i was at in my old save?

EDIT: nevermind, i fixed the issues myself, looks like i just forgot to update 1 mod and it was screwing up things this can be closed now...

Edited May 26, 2014 by Shadoworgon
